snippet: Gaza’s Hamas government is sticking to plans to carry out more executions and to do so in public for the first time, despite protests by human rights groups on Tuesday.
abstract: Gaza’s Hamas government plans to continue executions and to do so in public for first time, despite protests by human rights groups.
lead_paragraph: Gaza’s Hamas government is sticking to plans to carry out more executions and to do so in public for the first time, despite protests by human rights groups on Tuesday.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
